title: "You're About to Break Your Own Elbow" - With Tanya DePass
itunes:title: "You're About to Break Your Own Elbow" - With Tanya DePass
description:
The Halflings sit down with the legendary Tanya DePass to talk about the ever-changing worlds of TTRPG's and Gaming and our relationships with them as people of colour. We take some questions from our Patron's, talk lifting people up, prepping for multiple games across different systems, and of course the incredible 'Into The Motherlands'.


If you enjoy this podcast please help us out by leaving a review and sharing with your fellow adventurers.

Support us on Patreon at patreon.com/tbhalflings for your Shirefolk Shoutout and Bonus Episodes.

Connect with us on Twitter, Instagram and Facebook @tbhalflings, on our Discord or email secondbreakfast@tbhalflings.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
The Halflings sit down with the legendary Tanya DePass to talk about the ever-changing worlds of TTRPG's and Gaming and our relationships with them as people of colour. We take some questions from our Patron's, talk lifting people up, prepping for multiple games across different systems, and of course the incredible 'Into The Motherlands'.


If you enjoy this podcast please help us out by leaving a review and sharing with your fellow adventurers.
